requirements.description: SuT shall comply with all requirements associated with the NETN CB
SuT shall publish the NETN-SMC BaseEntity.SupportedActions attribute.
SuT shall publish the NETN-SMC SMC_Response interaction class.
SuT shall publish the NETN-ETR ETR_TaskStatus interaction class.
SuT shall publish NETN-ETR BaseEntity attributes PlannedTasks, CurrentTasks and TaskProgress.
SuT shall publish all NETN-ETR SMC_EntityControl.Task interaction subclasses corresponding to the supported NETN-SMC EntityControlActions as declared in CS.
SuT shall publish all NETN-ETR ETR_Report interaction subclasses as declared in CS.
SuT shall subscribe to all NETN-ETR SMC_EntityControl.Task interaction subclasses corresponding to the supported NETN-SMC EntityControlActions as declared in CS.
SuT shall subscribe to NETN-ETR SMC_EntityControl.RequestTaskStatus interaction class.
SuT shall subscribe to NETN-ETR SMC_EntityControl.CancelTasks interaction class.
SuT shall subscribe to the NETN-SMC BaseEntity.SupportedActions attribute.
SuT shall subscribe to the NETN-SMC SMC_Response interaction class.
SuT shall subscribe to the NETN-ETR ETR_TaskStatus interaction class.
SuT shall subscribe to all NETN-ETR ETR_Report interaction subclasses as declared in CS.
SuT shall update the NETN-SMC BaseEntity.SupportedActions attribute to include the list of currently supported tasks.
SuT shall respond to NETN-ETR SMC_EntityControl.Task interaction with a NETN-SMC SMC_Response with a status indicating success (accepting a task request) or failure (request not accepted).
SuT accepting a task request shall send NETN-ETR ETR_TaskStatus interactions to indicate changes in task execution status.
SuT accepting a task request shall respond to NETN-ETR SMC_EntityControl.RequestTaskStatus interaction by sending a NETN-ETR ETR_TaskStatus interaction with the latest execution status.
SuT accepting a task request shall update the NETN-ETR BaseEntity attributes PlannedTasks, CurrentTasks and TaskProgress to reflect current task status.
SuT shall only send NETN-ETR SMC_EntityControl.Task to an entity with a NETN-SMC BaseEntity.SupportedActions attribtue value that includes the corresponding task entity control action.
